subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The former U.S.C. coach says the challenge of taking over in Seattle and not an impending N.C.A.A. investigation into the Trojans’ program is what led to his departure.
snippet: The former U.S.C. coach says the challenge of taking over in Seattle and not an impending N.C.A.A. investigation into the Trojans’ program is what led to his departure.
